attributes.action: make an enquiry into why the CPS dropped the case against the un-named youth who harrassed Fiona Pilkington and her daughter Francecca  stating it was not in the public interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Through this petition I hope to gain support indicating that it is very much in the public interest for the CPS to pursue cases involving high levels of anti social behaviour. If cases like these are not pursued then the CPS are giving the green light to thugs who choose to make other law abiding peoples lives a living hell.

rejection.details: we do not accept e-petitions relating to individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
